name: Bronzong
description: One caused a news sensation when it was dug up at a construction site after a 2,000-year sleep.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is immune to ground-type moves, spikes, toxic spikes, and arena trap.  This ability is disabled during gravity or ingrain, or while holding an iron ball.  This ability is not disabled during roost.

abilities.name: Heatproof
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes half as much damage from fire-type moves and burns.
abilities.description: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

abilities.name: Heavy Metal
abilities.effect: This Pokémon has double the usual weight for its species.
